actions.label: Body
actions.description:
Success The target is moved 10 feet in any direction.

Critical Success The target also drops one item they are carrying or are knocked prone, attacker’s choice.

description.value:
Success The target is moved 10 feet in any direction.

Critical Success The target also drops one item they are carrying or are knocked prone, attacker’s choice.

Success The target is moved 10 feet in any direction.

Critical Success The target also drops one item they are carrying or are knocked prone, attacker’s choice.
All creatures within a 30 ft aura are always under the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{Feather Fall} spell.

Trigger: The Summerwind would take damage from a ranged weapon.

Effect: The damage is reduced by [[/r 4d8]]. If this would reduce it to zero, they may fling the weapon at any creature within 30 feet. Make a body strike. The flung projectile deals [[/r 2d8+7]] of the same type of damage the weapon normally deals.

Success The target is moved 10 feet in any direction.

Critical Success The target also drops one item they are carrying or are knocked prone, attacker’s choice.

The Summerwind throws debris and rubble in all directions. It may make a single Body attack against up to 3 enemies within 15 feet. These contribute to the multiple attack penalty after all 3 are completed.

uU to three allies within 30 feet may immediately use their reaction to stride and make a single attack at any point. If this succeeds, they deal an additional [[/r 1d8]] damage of the same type as their attack They may fly during this movement.
